Then Kylie makes 5 beaded bracelets and 7 beaded earrings on Wednesday. 20 beads are needed to make one beaded necklace. 10 beads are needed to make one beaded bracelet. 5 beads are needed to make one beaded earring. Jack makes 1000 non-beaded bracelets. How many beads does Kylie use in total to make her jewelry?
new_response:
Kylie makes:

- 10 necklaces on Monday: \(10 \text{ necklaces} \times 20 \text{ beads/necklace} = 200 \text{ beads}\)
- 2 necklaces on Tuesday: \(2 \text{ necklaces} \times 20 \text{ beads/necklace} = 40 \text{ beads}\)
- 5 bracelets on Wednesday: \(5 \text{ bracelets} \times 10 \text{ beads/bracelet} = 50 \text{ beads}\)
- 7 earrings on Wednesday: \(7 \text{ earrings} \times 5 \text{ beads/earring} = 35 \text{ beads}\)
